title: Identification
fullText:
Devices for emergency switching, including emergency stopping, shall be so placed and marked as to be readily identifiable and convenient for their intended use.
The means of operating these devices, such as handles or push-buttons for emergency switching, shall be legibly and permanently identified and coloured red with a contrasting background.
Exception: A lanyard, chain or rope used to provide a facility for remote operation of an emergency stopping device need not be coloured red, e.g. a lanyard above a conveyor.
